# robots.txt for Lucas AI Marketing Site
# Allow all crawlers to index the site

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location (will be generated by build)
Sitemap: https://meetlucas.ai/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay to be respectful of resources
Crawl-delay: 0

# Block specific paths if needed (none for now)
# Disallow: /admin
# Disallow: /api
